name: Journey Pets
blurb: Journey Pets is a pet catching game for Smart Phones featuring GPS, battle, upgrades, animated pets, and an online ranked arena.

rewards.reward: You get access to the closed beta of Journey Pets AND the Journey Pets Arena applications!  You will also receive in-game currency equivalent to a $25 value upon the release of Journey Pets on the marketplace.
You get the previous pledge reward, and an exclusive Rare quality striped tiger pet when the game hits the market. (See picture to the left)
All previous pledge rewards, and an exclusive Epic quality phoenix pet. (See picture to the left)

The first 100 backers to pledge $25 will receive the Legendary Feral Lion pet Ragemaw!  Backers who have already pledged $25 or more will receive this reward as well, along with anyone who puts in a pledge of over $25.  Pledging for this reward also gets you the Epic Phoenix pet.

The Digital Compilation!  You get: a PDF strategy guide to the inner workings of Journey Pets, a PDF art portfolio taking you through the game's creation, and the digital soundtrack.  This reward will also feature behind the scenes commentary for each item.

The previous rewards and a Journey Pets themed wall-poster signed by the artist and the Maverick Gaming development team.  Please be prepared to pay the shipping difference for international delivery.

Join us in Chicago for a sneak peek at Journey Pets, where we will demo the game for you, hold an informational panel and answer questions live!  The event will be recorded and posted online, however large or small it ends up being.  If it's big enough, we may even stream it live.  Be able to travel to Chicago to participate in this event please!  We'll give you a t-shirt to take home as well.

The previous rewards, and you will create an in-game event at a real world location of your choosing!  This event will center around either discovering a wounded pet, encountering a feral pet that may be battled, tracked, and caught, or fighting a rare boss plant monster.  Your name will be in the credits as the event's creator, and there will be an in-game achievement for completing all of these events.

You get to name and have a say in designing your very own pet, which will be included in the release of the game.  You also receive the original concept art for your pet, and your name will go in the credits as the pet's creator.  Make your mark on the world of Journey Pets forever!

All previous pledge rewards, and you will be able to list up to 20 real life locations where gamers will have to go in order to catch your pet.  We will create a graphical icon at those locations on our in-game world map to your specs, and users will need to not only be within a quarter-mile radius of one of your locations to catch your pet, but they will also need to tap your location icon.  We will create an in-game achievement for catching your specialized pet, and we will allow company names and logos to be part of the achievement.

The previous rewards, and a day with Maverick Gaming!  The day after our Journey Pets sneak peek, we are inviting you to stay and further demo Journey Pets in downtown Chicago with the game creators.  We'll take you around the real world, and the game world, to see the coolest landmarks in Chicago as well as some in-game events we will have set up around the city.  We'll get some lunch, hang out, talk video games, and just all around have a good time.  Kaff is asking that you spot him money for lunch.  Kidding!  We'll cover it with the money you're pledging, and the hotel too.  That was Candice's idea, she's the nice one.
